commits.message:
EUCA-12881 - authorize-migration-keys.pl can cause the node controller to fail to start

Description: On node controller startup authorize-migration-keys.pl will restart libvirtd, which can cause a race
             condition. This condition will cause the NC to drop into a failed state.

Changes:
 - Check to see if the configuration even changed, if not (most likely the case), don't restart libvirtd
 - Check to see if libvirtd comes back up after restarting libvirtd ~20 seconds.

Testing:
 - Tested script by hand to verify functionality.
 - Tested interaction with NC startup to verify that libvirtd is not getting restarted.
